HeroAboutMe.name: Matheus P. Silva
HeroAboutMe.subtitle: How to think through protecting your company’s most important assets

Head.title: Your Next Full Stack Developer
Head.description: I'm Matheus, a creative full stack developer based in Brazil with 10 years of career experience.

AboutMe.title: What I'm about?
AboutMe.story:
Hello! My name is Matheus Silva, and I am a Full Stack Developer from Brazil, whose passion for programming began at the age of 12. Initially, my involvement with technology was casual, working with PHP and WordPress until I was 16.



It was at that age that I decided to seriously focus on my career, transitioning to the JavaScript ecosystem, where I specialized in tools such as React, NextJs, and NodeJs. This focus allowed me to develop innovative and scalable solutions, transforming complex ideas into impactful digital products.



Today, at 25, my career is a reflection of my commitment to innovation and technical quality. I continue to explore new technologies and methodologies to improve the systems I develop, always with the goal of exceeding market expectations. Outside of work, I am passionate about single-player games, eclectic music, and traveling, which enrich my life with new experiences and perspectives.

SoftSkills.TechnicalLeadershipDescription: Expertise in leading technical teams and steering the development of complex software projects.
SoftSkills.StrategicThinkingDescription: Advanced strategic planning and decision-making skills with a focus on achieving business objectives.
SoftSkills.EffectiveCommunicationDescription: Proficiency in articulating technical concepts and strategies to cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
SoftSkills.CollaborativeTeamworkDescription: Proven ability to forge and lead cross-functional teams towards common goals in dynamic environments.
SoftSkills.EmotionalIntelligenceDescription: Skilled in nurturing team environments and fostering professional relationships through high emotional intelligence.

CurrentlyLearning.descriptionLargeLanguageModels: Diving deep into natural language understanding and generation with models like GPT-3 to explore applications in text analysis, chatbots, and more.
CurrentlyLearning.descriptionOpenAiAPI: Integrating OpenAI's API to leverage cutting-edge AI models for natural language processing, providing powerful solutions in various domains.
CurrentlyLearning.descriptionMultitenancy: Studying the architecture required to support multitenancy in SaaS products, ensuring efficient resource utilization and data isolation.
CurrentlyLearning.descriptionSAAS: Exploring vector databases like Milvus to enable efficient similarity search and indexing at scale, for applications in recommendation systems and AI.
CurrentlyLearning.introWords: Recently, I've been exploring key emerging technologies like LLM, OpenAI API, and SaaS solutions. These studies are expanding my insights and paving the way for future projects.
